title: Iggy Azalea claps back at TI fter he called her the 'tarnish of my legacy'
text:
Iggy Azalea is in yet another feud.

The notoriously argumentative Australian shot back at rapper T.I. after he'd made some barbed comments about her during an interview published Wednesday.

Azalea, 29, tweeted and then deleted her clapback which claimed she had some 'tea' to spill about her time working with the hip hop star whom she referred to as 'salty.'

Shots fired: Iggy Azalea feuding with rapper T.I. after he made some barbed comments about her during an interview published Wednesday (Pictured in July)

T.I., who goes by the moniker Tip these days, called his work with Iggy a 'blunder' while speaking with The Root.

'I'm still actively looking for another female rapper who can undo the blunder of Iggy Azalea,' Tip said.

'That is the tarnish of my legacy as far as [being] a [music] executive is concerned.'

Iggy, whose real name is Amethyst Amelia Kelly, was signed by T.I. to his own Grand Hustle record label in 2011.

'I'm still actively looking for another female rapper who can undo the blunder of Iggy Azalea,' Ti said in the interview. 'That is the tarnish of my legacy as far as [being] a [music] executive is concerned.' (Pictured in 2014)

After she rocketed to stardom with her hit Fancy, Iggy was embroiled in several controversies over the years from severe financial issues to accusations of cultural appropriation to several celebrity beefs.

'To me, this is like when Michael Jordan went to play baseball,' the 39-year-old record exec said.

Iggy wasted no time hitting back at her former mentor and took to her favorite platform, Twitter, to put in her two cents.

'Imagine thinking I was his biggest blunder lmaooooooooo,' she wrote in the now-deleted Tweet.

'Imagine thinking I was his biggest blunder lmaooooooooo,' Iggy responded in the now-deleted Tweet. 'Tip. Sweetie. We have a whole list for you. The tea I could spill on what bulls**t this is but at the end of the day I think people can see it's clear he's salty. He's a huge misogynist and has never been able to have a conversation with any woman in which he doesn't speak like a fortune cookie.' (Pictured in 2014)

'Tip. Sweetie. We have a whole list for you.'

She later added: 'The tea I could spill on what bulls**t this is but at the end of the day I think people can see it's clear he's salty.

'He's a huge misogynist and has never been able to have a conversation with any woman in which he doesn't speak like a fortune cookie.'

The past: Iggy, whose real name is Amethyst Amelia Kelly, was signed by T.I. to his own Grand Hustle record label in 2011 but the two had a falling out (Pictured in 2014)

T.I., whose real name is Clifford Joseph Harris Jr, dealt drugs as a teen and has quite a checkered past which included several arrests for things like felony weapons convictions and public drunkeness.

He also racked up millions in unpaid taxes and was slapped with a lien by the IRS in 2015.

Azalea took down the frosty post shortly after publishing it and hasn't made a peep about the controversy since.
description: Iggy Azalea feuding with rapper T.I. after he made some barbed comments about her during an interview published Wednesday.
